svg.script: function byeByeB() { document.documentElement.pauseAnimations(); document.documentElement.setCurrentTime(0); // Drop b var b = document.getElementById('b'); b.parentNode.removeChild(b); b = null; // Snapshot at time t=4s. This is because there are two possible error cases // we want to detect: // i) b disappears and we just keep the existing time for a.begin+1s of t=2s // ii) b disappears and we update the time for a.begin+1s to t=3s setTimeAndSnapshot(4, false); }
